notes.completeness: 3/10 constraints traced: load_data, process, count. Missing: validate, filter, transform, aggregate, reports, error handling, batch, export
notes.semantic_alignment: LLM gives partial credit — code is correct but incomplete

notes.alternative_delta: Many simpler and equivalent alternatives exist for this partial implementation
notes.minimalism: Code is too simple relative to declared intent

notes.naming: Clean naming on the 3 functions that exist
notes.layer_consistency: Incomplete scope makes layer analysis partial
notes.error_unity: No error handling at all (by design — shows missing requirement)

reproducibility.purpose: Intentional NON_CONVERGED example — demonstrates validator correctly detecting incomplete implementation
reproducibility.note: LLM components require ANTHROPIC_API_KEY. Run: python convergence_validator.py examples/incomplete
